title: A Randomized Double-Blind, Active-Controlled  Study of HFR-841 (SGLT2 inhibitor) in Patients With Crohn's Disease
officialTitle: A Randomized Double-Blind, Active-Controlled  Study of HFR-841 (SGLT2 inhibitor) in Patients With Crohn's Disease
sponsor: Centre for Addiction and Mental Health
description: This is a randomized double-blind, active-controlled  study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of HFR-841 (SGLT2 inhibitor) in patients with Crohn's Disease. The study will enroll approximately 180 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 22-65 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Crohn's Disease
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
